options.name: pogo
options.description: Pokémon Go options

options.name: share
options.description: Share a Pokémon Go friend code with this channel

options.name: user
options.description: The user of the friend code to share (shares yours if left blank)

options.name: set
options.description: Set your Pokémon Go friend code

options.name: pogocode
options.description: Your Pokémon Go friend code

options.name: private
options.description: If public, others can lookup your Pokémon Go friend code. If private, only you can share it.

options.name: clear
options.description: Remove your Pokémon Go friend code
